capabilities.name: Code Generation
capabilities.description: Generate code in multiple programming languages from natural language descriptions
requirements: Claude API access or claude.ai subscription

capabilities.name: Code Analysis
capabilities.description: Analyze and explain existing code, including complex algorithms

capabilities.name: Bug Detection and Fixing
capabilities.description: Identify bugs and suggest fixes in code

capabilities.name: Code Refactoring
capabilities.description: Refactor code for better performance, readability, or maintainability

capabilities.name: Test Generation
capabilities.description: Generate unit tests and test cases

capabilities.name: Documentation Writing
capabilities.description: Generate code documentation, README files, and API documentation

capabilities.name: Interactive Coding Chat
capabilities.description: Interactive conversation about code with context retention

capabilities.name: Extended Context Window
capabilities.description: 200K token context window for processing large codebases

capabilities.name: Multi-file Code Understanding
capabilities.description: Understand and work with multiple files and complex project structures

capabilities.name: Security Analysis
capabilities.description: Identify security vulnerabilities and suggest secure coding practices

capabilities.name: API Access
capabilities.description: RESTful API for integrating Claude into custom tools and workflows

capabilities.name: Tool Use (Function Calling)
capabilities.description: Claude can use external tools and APIs via function calling

capabilities.name: Computer Use (Beta)
capabilities.description: Claude can interact with computer interfaces, including IDEs

capabilities.name: System Prompts
capabilities.description: Customize Claude's behavior with system prompts

capabilities.name: Vision Capabilities
capabilities.description: Analyze images including code screenshots and diagrams
